DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if memantine is effective in treating symptoms of Fragile X-associated Tremor Ataxia Syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Memantine Treatment in Fragile X-Associated Tremor/Ataxia Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Fragile X premutation carrier (CGG repeat 55200)with neurological symptoms; Clinical FXTAS Stage 15 Previous reaction to memantine
